name: Trials Fusion: The Awesome Max Edition
name_original: Trials Fusion: The Awesome Max Edition
description:
Trials Fusion: The Awesome Max Edition is a racing game developed by Redlynx. It came out on 14-07-2015. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Trials Fusion: The Awesome Max Edition is available on PC and PlayStation 4.
